name: TexturedButtonBuilder
description: The TexturedButtonBuilder class provides a fluent builder API for creating textured buttons with custom textures for different button states. This builder extends the standard button functionality to support texture-based buttons with custom visual appearances for normal, disabled, and focused states.
overview:
The TexturedButtonBuilder class enables creation of sophisticated textured buttons with:

- **Texture Management**: Support for custom textures in different button states
- **State-Based Textures**: Separate textures for enabled, disabled, and focused states
- **Builder Pattern**: Fluent API for readable and maintainable button creation
- **Complete Widget Control**: Full control over positioning, sizing, appearance, and behavior
- **Screen Integration**: Automatic integration with JSMacros custom screens
- **Error Handling**: Built-in error handling for button actions

constructors.description: Creates a new TexturedButtonBuilder for the specified screen.

parameters.name: screen
parameters.description: The screen to add the textured button to

methods.name: enabledTexture
methods.description: Sets the texture to display when the button is enabled and not focused.

parameters.name: texture
parameters.description: The texture resource for enabled state

methods.name: disabledTexture
methods.description: Sets the texture to display when the button is disabled.

parameters.name: texture
parameters.description: The texture resource for disabled state

methods.name: enabledFocusedTexture
methods.description: Sets the texture to display when the button is enabled and focused.

parameters.name: texture
parameters.description: The texture resource for focused enabled state
